channel.title: The spam on moparisthebest.com
channel.description:
Isn't it just pathetic? Okay the moderators aren't on 24/7. So we should have some sort of idea on how to stop the spam.
- Make the rules more clear. I doubt anybody reads them, make it VERY clear. - Add on a modification, a sort of anti-flood. - Block out non-local links? Because they are normally 'youfail' or some other misleading site link. (Allow local links however, ie moparscape/moparisthebest)
I'm not sure what else, but put your ideas here on how to stop the spam here, or just post if you agree, it's getting out of hand.. :/

item.title: The spam on moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

And this isn’t contributing to the spam? I’m willing to bet that the mods are already aware of this.

Read full topic

item.title: The spam on moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:3, topic:228819”]1.) Moparisthebest is remaking the forums
2.) The rules will be enforced even harder after the remade forums i think
3.) Blockin Non local links will blick uppit and shit lawlz
4.) They are adding an antiflood to every 3 minutes for 1 new topic

Read the sticky[/quote]

1.) Moparisthebest is remaking the forums, oh wow what will that do?
2.) The rules will be enforced even harder, you think hm?
3.) Blocking non-local links will ‘blick’ up uppit and shit will it? There is such thing as ‘exceptions’
4.) They are adding an anti-flood to very 3 minutes for 1 new topic? Oh cause that’s really gonna help, where’d you find that one?

Read full topic

item.title: The spam on moparisthebest.com
item.dc:creator: @mLexus mLexus
item.description:
@mLexus wrote:

Isn’t it just pathetic? Okay the moderators aren’t on 24/7. So we should have some sort of idea on how to stop the spam.

  • Make the rules more clear. I doubt anybody reads them, make it VERY clear.
  • Add on a modification, a sort of anti-flood.
  • Block out non-local links? Because they are normally ‘youfail’ or some other misleading site link. (Allow local links however, ie moparscape/moparisthebest)

I’m not sure what else, but put your ideas here on how to stop the spam here, or just post if you agree, it’s getting out of hand…
